Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. define: Use this api to download shipping_document. You have to call v2.logistics.create_booking_shipping_document to create a new shipping document task first and call v2.logistics.get_booking_shipping_document_result to get the task status second. If the task is READY, you can download this shipping document.

error_list.name: error_config
error_list.description: Something is wrong, please try again later.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The type of shipping document. Available values: NORMAL_AIR_WAYBILL,THERMAL_AIR_WAYBILL

","key":"fdXsijj"}]}
